# Component 1.2 & 1.3: Facilities Data 

## Facilities Data {.tabset}

### Data Columns Summary: Facilities
| Column                            | Type   | Description                                                      | Example Values                              |
|:----------------------------------|:------:|:-----------------------------------------------------------------|:--------------------------------------------|
| `date`                            | date   | Reporting date for the facility record                           | `2025-07-15`, `2025-06-30`                  |
| `Governorate`                     | string | Governorate where the facility is located                        | `Hadramawt`, `Aden`, `Al Hudaydah`          |
| `District`                        | string | District within the governorate                                  | `Tarim`, `Crater`, `Hays`                   |
| `Village Name/ /ozla`             | string | Village / sub-district (Ê¿uzlah) name                              | `Al Maqd`, `Qusayar`, `AL-Ghail bawazeer`   |
| `Type`                            | string | Facility type                                                     | `School`, `Clinic`, `Hospital`              |
| `Facility name`                   | string | Official facility name                                            | `Aisha Complex for Girls`, `Al Rayadah hospital` |
| `Phase`                           | string | Project phase or tranche                                          | `Roll-Out-1`, `Phase 2`, `Pilot`            |
| `Status`                          | string | Implementation status                                             | `Energized`, `Installed`, `Planned`         |
| `Comments (if any)`               | string | Free-text notes                                                   | `Delayed due to weather`, `Awaiting permits`|
| `Installed/planned capacity (kW)` | float  | Installed or planned PV capacity in kilowatts                     | `10.0`, `15.5`, `50.0`                      |
| `Male Beneficiaries (approx.)`    | float  | Approximate male beneficiaries                                    | `1401.0`, `120.0`                           |
| `Female Beneficiaries (approx.)`  | float  | Approximate female beneficiaries                                  | `266.0`, `150.0`                            |
| `Total Beneficiaries (approx.)`     | int    | Approximate total beneficiaries                                   | `184`, `650`                                |
| `Coordinate`                        | string | Latitude, longitude (decimal degrees)                             | `12.785, 45.032`                            |
